projects.title: An Online Shopping App
projects.description: An E-commerce app that lets you shop for products of different categories. You can change the currency to your desired currency, add the same product with different attributes, get a cart overlay of all your added products. etc. I built this app using react, react-redux, css and typescript

projects.title: Restaurant Ordering Application
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for building both the backend and frontend of this application. I used Next.js, antD, css, for building the frontend. The backend was built with nest.js and mongoDB was used for the database. I used jest for testing in the backend. This Restaurant Ordering Application has many features, such as allowing you sign up, as a restaurant owner, to manage your restaurant orders and reservations. It also allows you to sign up as a customer, so that you can place orders from your favourite restaurants. View restaurant locations and track the status for the delivery of your orders.

projects.title: A Construction and Freight Services Agency Landing Page
projects.description: I had to develop a landing page for a general contractor and freight handling agency. I also included a third party chat application, powered by tawk.io. a feature that allows you send an email right from the landing page to the company's email address. This application was built with javascript, bootstrap and plain css. I AM CURRENTLY WORKING ON THIS. COMING SOON.
